data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Jaunpur, Uttar Pradesh, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jaunpur, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Jaunpur, Uttar Pradesh, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 49,436 believers in the county of Jaunpur the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Jaunpur.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Dharkar people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Jaunpur, Uttar Pradesh, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Jaunpur. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Jaunpur to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: Jaunpur
location.people_groups_list: Chamar (Muslim traditions), Darzi Mathuria (Muslim traditions), Darzi Namdev (Muslim traditions), Kharot, Jogi Kanphata (Muslim traditions)
